"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54daeb4663687257ef0b0e00#post_54daeb4663687257ef0b0e00
That's what I did, but I think It depends solely on how many matches or just by random.

also, The method to make that go by faster is go to options and turn it to Stock Smash and then set the stocks to only 1 stock and jump off the ledge.

No kidding, dying doesn't matter you will still unlock the next character when playing Smash mode.

"We are the Yazidi state!"

"It was an act of revenge by the Yazidis," said 41-year-old Dhafer Ali Hussein from Sibaya, one of the affected villages. "The aim is to expel Arabs from the area so that only Yazidis remain: they want to change the map."
